name: Super Ball Boy
description: Super Ball Boy is an adventure platformer game about a young Sphere named Azule. Azule's spherical homeland is being invaded by the evil Cubes and he is the only one left to stop them. Fight enemies, collect coins to spend on powerups, and defeat the King Cube. Music made by MusicalWolfe, CapnCoconuts, Theosmeo, and Thomas Carter.
